intro: Psychotria insularum var. montanum, commonly known as the mountain psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Caribbean, particularly found in the mountainous regions of Cuba. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in shaded, humid environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its restricted habitat, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
